column2: The Sick Man of Europe

The recent war has broken our great nation and now there are serious fears that $COUNTRY$ will not survive the decade. Several political figures in our country have suggested that we seek international arbitration to give us protection from future wars.
We will ask one of the Great Powers to help us
We will not risk another humilation
The Congress of $CAPITAL$

The recent war against $FROMCOUNTRY$ has cast serious doubts on their ability to survive the decade, bringing great instability to the region. We have set ourselves as arbiters and called a congress in $CAPITAL$ where we will confer with the other Great Powers to decide the fate of $FROMCOUNTRY$.
Keep $FROMCOUNTRY$ strong
Partition $FROMCOUNTRY$
The Government of $FROMCOUNTRY$ has accepted to discuss our condition with the other Great Powers. We must now wait and see what their decision shall be.
I am sure they will understand our position

we have been called to a congress to decide the fate of $FROMCOUNTRY$ after their latest disastrous war. If they collapsed naturally we would see decades of instability in the region so we are left with a difficult decision:
The Congress Rules against us
The recent international congress has decided for the partition of our European possessions in the hopes of accelerating our demise.
$COUNTRY$ Partitioned
The recent international congress has decided for the partition of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Europe in the hopes of stabilizing the region and avoiding future conflict. We are confident that peace will triumph.
The recent international congress has partitioned $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Europe in the hopes of stabilizing the region and avoiding future conflict.
An international congress has partitioned $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Europe in the hopes of stabilizing the region.
We will rise again!
The Congress Rules in our favor
The recent international congress has decided to aid our internal situation by determining new administrative divisions in our European territories and acting as guarantors of our independence.
$COUNTRY$ Supported

The recent international congress has decided to prop up $COUNTRY$ in the hopes of stabilizing the region and avoiding future conflict. New semi-independent nations have been formed under the protection of the premier Great Powers as a buffer for the weakened $COUNTRY$.
The recent international congress has propped up $COUNTRY$ in the hopes of stabilizing the region and avoiding future conflict.
An international congress has propped up $COUNTRY$ in the hopes of stabilizing the region.
We thank the participants to the congress

The recent international congress has decided to prop up $COUNTRY$ in the hopes of stabilizing the region and avoiding future conflict. New semi-independent nations have been formed under the protection of the premier Great Powers as a buffer for the weakened $COUNTRY$.
We will see how long this lasts
The recent international congress has decided for the partition of $COUNTRY_ADJ$ Europe in the hopes of stabilizing the region and avoiding future conflict.
$COUNTRY$ Granted Autonomy
Partial freedom!
$COUNTRY$ Granted Independence
Freedom!
The Breakup of $FROMCOUNTRY$

$FROMCOUNTRY$ has been sidelined in an international congress and now treaty talks have begun to discuss the breakup of their empire. As an enemy of $FROMCOUNTRY$, any $COUNTRY_ADJ$ lands currently in $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ possession will be returned to us.
We simply wish our lands back
$COUNTRY_ADJ$ Freedom
The defeat of $FROMCOUNTRY$ in their war and subsequent congress has forced them to release us from their direct rule.
$COUNTRY$ shall be free
